description:
Indicates whether subject ever regularly smoked cigarettes.No means less than 20 packs in a lifetime or less than 1 cigarette for 1 year.

Harmonized by the NSRR team to align with TOPMed and BioDataCatalyst standards. Source: :never_cigarette_smoker: :current_cigarette_smoker: :current_smokeless_user: :shq_eversmoked: at Baseline
